Pipo_payin_doku_message_paymentcode: Your TikTok Shop payment code is: {payment_code}. Please make your payment within {countdown_hhmm} before the code expires. To see detailed instructions, go to "Settings and privacy" > "Orders" in the TikTok app.
instrument_error_ui00032: Invalid card. Try another card or contact your card issuer for more information.
instrument_error_ui00033: Invalid card information. Make sure information is entered correctly and try again.
instrument_error_ui00034: Card expired. Try another card or contact your card issuer for more information.
instrument_error_ui00035: Invalid card. Try another card or contact your card issuer for more information.
instrument_error_ui00036: Invalid card number.  Make sure card number is entered correctly and try again.
instrument_error_ui00037: Invalid CVV/CVC. Make sure information is entered correctly and try again.
instrument_error_ui00038: Invalid ZIP/postal code. Make sure information is entered correctly and try again.

instrument_error_ui00040: Invalid PIN. Make sure PIN is entered correctly and try again.
instrument_error_ui0035: The phone number doesn't match any account. Please check the number and try again.
payin_pay_with_PayPal_redirect: You will be redirected to PayPal to complete your payment securely
pipo_aml_header_notice: We collect information of the account holder for security reasons. The information will be kept confidential and not be shared for any other purposes.
pipo_common_citizenship_intro: Citizenship is the legal status of being a citizen of a particular country.
pipo_common_delete_card_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this card？
pipo_common_error_card_check: Card number must only contain numbers
pipo_common_error_card_default: Something went wrong with your  payment. Please try again later. {error_code}
pipo_common_error_card_not_supported: Invalid or unsupported form of card
pipo_common_error_month_check: Month must be a number between 01 and 12
pipo_common_error_paste_beyond_length: Pasted data beyonds character limit. / Pasting beyonds character limit.
pipo_common_error_year_too_far: Year is too far into the future
pipo_common_nationality_intro: Nationality is the status of belonging to a particular nation/country, whether by birth or naturalization.
pipo_common_ovo_id_hint: OVO ID is the phone number linked to your OVO account
pipo_common_payin_dana_badge: Limited offers. 50% off up to Rp 10,000
pipo_common_payin_mobile_address_popup1_: The address to which you would like your orders shipped.
pipo_common_payin_mobile_address_popup2_: The address associated with your credit or debit card account.
pipo_common_payin_mobile_address_popup3_: Selecting this option will remove the address you entered on this screen. If you wish to keep the address you entered, tap "Cancel".
pipo_common_payin_ovo_id_append: Your phone number will be saved for the next OVO payment
pipo_common_payin_pci: We comply with the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) to secure transmission and protect your personal data.
pipo_common_payin_pci_compliance: We follow the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) and use industry-standard encryption to protect the confidentiality of your personal information.
pipo_common_payin_ph_ovo_id_updated: Enter the phone number linked to your OVO account
pipo_common_payin_phone_number_append: A payment code and other payment information will be sent to your phone
pipo_common_payin_save_card: Save this card for next time
pipo_common_payin_tips_security_code: Security code is on your credit card or debit card is a 3 digit number on VISA and MasterCard branded credit and  debit cards. On your American Express branded credit or debit card it is a 4  digit numeric code.
pipo_common_payin_tips_security_code_1: The CVV is a number with 3 or 4 digits printed on the back or front of your card
pipo_dropinsdk_pc_paymentcode_exipiredhi: Complete the payment before the countdown ends to prevent expiration
pipo_merchantwithdraw_bindcard_top_up_hi: If you do not have Payoneer account, please register an account at http://tracking.payoneer.com/SH2tY before bind account
pipo_merchantwithdraw_fail_subtitle: Please try again or go back to home page
pipo_merchantwithdraw_list_top_up_hint: Please choose a Payoneer account that will receive the payments for your shop {Merchant name} with the shop ID {Merchant ID}
pipo_merchantwithdraw_pending_after_48hr: The account is in the process of registration，please try again after 48 hours
pipo_notice_valid_card_number: Please enter a valid card number
pipo_payin_agree: By continuing, you agree to our {Terms_of_Service} and {Privacy_Policy}.
pipo_payin_card_bind_fail_notice: Please try again or try a different card.
pipo_payin_card_bind_success_notice: This card has been added in your payment method.
pipo_payin_card_sub_decline_01: The transaction amount exceeds the daily limit.
pipo_payin_card_sub_decline_03: The amount exceeds the limits established by the issuer for this  transaction.
pipo_payin_card_sub_decline_05: PIN code you entered is not correct

pipo_payin_card_sub_decline_13: Please call your issuing bank for more information
pipo_payin_card_sub_decline_14: Please change another card to try again

pipo_payin_checkout_midpage2_wait_sub: The transfer could take a few minutes to complete
pipo_payin_checkout_ovo_main: 1. Make sure to keep the TikTok app open while you are on OVO. To check your order, go to the "Me" tab and open the options menu, then select "Account" > "Orders".\n2. You need to have an OVO Premium account for purchases over Rp 2 million IDR.\n3. If you don't have the OVO app installed on your device, please download it and turn on push notifications.
pipo_payin_checkout_ovo_title: Open the OVO app to approve the payment within 55 seconds
pipo_payin_confirm_3ds_main: The payment will be processed in 15 seconds
pipo_payin_confirm_main: The payment should be completed in 15 seconds
pipo_payin_estimate_time: Funds should arrive in {day1} - {day2} business days
pipo_payin_last_pay_fail_notice: Something went wrong with your last payment.
pipo_payin_midpage_mobile_bindPI_subTitl: It may take a few moments before your accounts are linked.
pipo_payin_no_cards_added: No credit/debit cards have been added
pipo_payin_payment_bca_info: If you use BCA mobile banking to make a payment, select "m-Transfer" > "Antar Bank" under "Daftar Transfer", then select "Bank Mandiri".
pipo_payin_payment_bcapopup_main: This will be an inter-bank transfer via Mandiri and additional fees can be charged
pipo_payin_payment_cashphoneremind: A payment code and other payment information will be sent to your phone
pipo_payin_payment_dont_know: Don't know how to make payment
pipo_payin_payment_main_pppp: Payment transactions processed by PIPO. By continuing, you confirm that you agree to {PIPO's Privacy Policy}.
pipo_payin_payment_otherbankpopup_main: Select this option If your bank is not listed here
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ALFA_CVS_content:
1. Select Alframart payment option and write down your 16-digit payment code
2. Go to Alfamart, Alfamidi, or  Lawson store to make a payment
3. Inform the cashier that you wish to make a convenience store payment to TikTok via Doku, and provide your payment code
4. Wait for the cashier to confirm the merchant name, customer name, and the payment amount
5. Make the payment
6. When the transaction is completed, make sure to receive the receipt with a stamp and the cashier's signature
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID001_atm_content:
1. Insert your BRI debit card and enter your PIN 
2. Select "Other Transaction", then "Payment" > "Others" > "BRIVA"
3. Enter your 16-digit payment code
4. Confirm that the BRIVA number,  customer name, and payment amount are correct
5. Follow the instructions to finish the payment
6. When the transaction is completed, print out a receipt and keep it for your records
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID001_internet_ba:
1. Log in to your BNI Internet Banking account at https://ib.bri.co.id/ib-bri/Login.html
2. Select "Billing Payment", then "Payment" > "BRIVA"
3. Enter your 16-digit payment code
4. Confirm that the BRIVA number,  customer name, and payment amount are correct
5. Enter your password and mToken
6. When the transaction is completed, take a screenshot or print out a receipt page and keep it for your records
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID001_mobile_bank:
1. Log in to your BRI mobile account
2. Select "Mobile Banking BRI", and then tap "PEMBAYARAN" > "BRIVA"
3. Enter your 16-digit payment code
4. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. Enter your PIN
6. When the transaction is completed, the payment receipt will be sent to you by SMS

1. Log in to your BRI mobile account
2. Select "Mobile Banking BRI", and then tap "PEMBAYARAN" > "BRIVA"
3. Enter your 16-digit payment code
4. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. Enter your PIN
6. When the transaction is completed, the payment receipt will be sent to you by SMS
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID001_otherbank_c:
1. Choose "TRANSFER", then "Transfer to other bank"
2. Enter BRI bank code (002) (If you use BCA mobile, make sure to be registered first)
3. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
4. Enter your Virtual Account Number
5. Follow the instructions to finish the payment
6. Confirm that the payment confirmation screen is displayed
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID003_atm_content:
1. Insert your ATM card and enter your PIN
2. Select "Pay/Buy"
3. Select "Others", then select "Multipayment"
4. Enter the DOKU Biller Code (89022), then select "Correct"
5. Enter DOKU "Virtual Account Number", then select "Correct"
6. Enter "1" for billing, then select "Yes"
7. When the payment confirmation screen is displayed, select "Yes"
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID003_internet_ba:
1. Log in to your Mandiri Online account
2. Select "Payment"
3. Select "Multipayment"
4. Select "DOKU" (Biller Code: 89022) for the service provider
5. Enter your Virtual Account Number
6. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order, then select "Continue"
7. After the payment amount is displayed, select "Confirm"
8. Enter your PIN and Challenge Code Token
9. When the transaction is completed, take a screenshot or print out a receipt page and keep it for your records
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID003_mobile_bank:
1. Log in to your Mandiri mobile banking account
2. Select "Bayar" > "Multipayment", and then tap "LANJUT"
3. Search and select "DOKU Merchant (89022)" from the "Penyedia Jasa" list
4. Under "No Virtual", enter your 16-digit payment code, and tap "TAMBAH SEBAGAI NOMOR BARU"
5. Under "Nominal", enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order, and tap "LANJUT"
6. Tap "KONFIRMASI" on the Konfirmasi Pembayaran page
7. Enter your PIN and save your order

1. Log in to your Mandiri mobile banking account
2. Select "Bayar" > "Multipayment", and then tap "LANJUT"
3. Search and select "DOKU Merchant (89022)" from the "Penyedia Jasa" list
4. Under "No Virtual", enter your 16-digit payment code, and tap "TAMBAH SEBAGAI NOMOR BARU"
5. Under "Nominal", enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order, and tap "LANJUT"
6. Tap "KONFIRMASI" on the Konfirmasi Pembayaran page
7. Enter your PIN and save your order
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID007_atm_content:
1. Insert your ATM card
2. Select language
3. Enter your ATM PIN
4. Select "Other Menu"
5. Select "Transfer"
6. Select the account type  (Example: "From Source Account")
7. Select "Virtual Account Billing"
8. Enter your Virtual Account Number
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID007_internet_ba:
1. Log in to your BNI Internet Banking account at https://ibank.bni.co.id
2. Select "Transfer"
3. Select "Virtual Account Billing"
4. Enter your Virtual Account Number 
5. Select your debit account you wish to use, then select "Continue"
6. Confirm that the payment amount is displayed on the screen
7. Enter your TAC to initiate the transaction
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID007_mobile_bank:
1. Log in to your BNI Mobile Banking account
2. Select "Transfer"
3. Select "Virtual Account Billing",  then select your debit account
4. Enter your Virtual Account Number in "New Input"
5. Confirm that the payment amount is displayed on the screen
6. Confirm the transaction and enter your transaction password
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID007_otherbank_c:
1. Select "TRANSFER", then "Transfer to other bank"
2. Enter BNI bank code (009) (If you use BCA mobile, you need to have a BNI account)
3. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order 
4. Enter your Virtual Account Number
5. Follow the instructions to finish the payment
6. Confirm that the payment confirmation screen is displayed
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID009_atm_content:
1. Insert your ATM card and enter your CIMB PIN 
2. Select "Payment", then "Continue" > "Virtual Account"
3. Enter your Virtual Account Number
4. Verify your virtual account holder name and Virtual Account Number
5. Select "OK" to initiate the payment
6. When the transaction is completed, print out a receipt and keep it for your records
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID009_internet_ba:
1. Log in to your online banking account
2. Select the option to transfer to other online bank
3. Select CIMB Niaga Bank (Bank code: 022)
4. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. Verify your virtual account holder name, Virtual Account Number, and the payment amount
6. Follow the instructions to finish the payment
7. Confirm that the payment confirmation screen is displayed
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID009_mobile_bank:
1. Log in to your Go Mobile account
2. Select "Transfer to other CIMB Niaga account"
3. Select your source account: CASA or Phone account.
4. Enter your Virtual Account Number
5. Enter your Mobile Banking PIN
6. When the transaction is completed, the payment receipt will be sent to you by SMS
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID009_otherbank_c:
1. Select "TRANSFER", then "Transfer to other bank"
2. Enter CIMB bank code (022) (If you use BCA mobile, you need to have a CIMB account)
3. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
4. Enter your Virtual Account Number
5. Follow the instructions to finish the payment
6. Confirm that the payment confirmation screen is displayed
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID011_atm_content:
1. Insert your ATM card and enter your PIN
2. Select "Payment" > "Other" "Virtual Account"
3. Enter your 16-digit payment code
4. Verify your virtual account holder name, Virtual Account Number, institution, and the payment amount
5. Select "Yes" to initiate the payment
6. When the transaction is completed, print out a receipt and keep it for your records
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID011_mobile_bank:
1. Log in to your D-Mobile account
2. Select "Payment"
3. Select your virtual account, add the biller, and select "Payment"
4. Enter your 16-digit payment code
5. Verify the payment details and enter your transaction PIN.
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID011_otherbank_c:
1. Select "Transfer"
2. Select "Transfer to other bank" and select "Danamon Bank" as the destination
3. Enter Danamon bank code (011) and your 16-digit payment code
4. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. When the payment confirmation screen is displayed, select "Yes"
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID013_atm_content: 1. Select "Payment" \n2. Select "Virtual Account"\n3. Enter your Virtual Account Number and select "Correct"
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID013_internet_ba:
1. Select "Fund Transfer"
2. Select "Virtual Account"
3. Select your source account 
4. Enter your Virtual Account Number
5. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
6. Enter your TAC to initiate the transaction
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID013_mobile_bank: Send a SMS message to "69811" with the information in the following format: TRANSFER <source account number> <Virtual Account Number> <payment amount>
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID013_otherbank_c:
1. Select "Transfer" under the bank menu
2. Enter Maybank bank code (016) and enter your Virtual Account Number
3. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
4. When the payment confirmation screen is displayed, select "Yes"
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID015_atm_content:
1. Select "Other Transaction" 
2. Select "Payment" > "Other Payment"
3. Select "Virtual Account"
4. Enter your Virtual Account Number
5. Confirm that the payment confirmation screen is displayed
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID015_internet_ba:
1. Log in to your PermataNet account
2. Select "Billing Payment"
3. Select "Virtual Account" and enter your Virtual Account Number
4. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. Enter your TAC to initiate the transaction
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID015_mobile_bank:
1. Log in to your PermataMobile X account
2. Select "Billing Payment"
3. Select "Virtual Account" and enter your Virtual Account Number
4. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. Enter your TAC to initiate the transaction
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID015_otherbank_c:
1. Select "Transfer"
2. Enter Permata bank code (013) and select "CORRECT", then add the prefix (8641) followed by the 12-digit payment code
3. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
4. Confirm that the payment confirmation screen is displayed
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID128_atm_content:
1. Insert your ATM card that has an ATM Bersama logo on it
2. Select "Transfer to other bank"
3. Enter the Artajasa bank code (987) and your Virtual Account Number
4. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. Confirm the information to initiate the payment
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID128_mobile_bank:
1. Open the app affiliated with ATM Bersama
2. Select "Transfer to other bank"
3. Enter the Artajasa bank code (987) and your Virtual Account Number
4. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. Confirm the information to initiate the payment
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID155_atm_content:
1. Insert your ATM card and enter your PIN
2. Select "Transaksi Lainnya" > "Transfer" > "ke Rekening BCA Virtual Account"
3. Enter your 16-digit payment code
4. Confirm that the Virtual Account code, account holder name, products, and payment amount are correct
5. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
6. Follow the on-screen instructions to initiate the payment
7. When the transaction is completed, print out a receipt and keep it for your records
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID155_internet_ba:
1. Log in to your BCA Internet Banking account at https://klikbca.com
2. Select "Transfer Dana" > "Transfer ke BCA Virtual Account"
3. On the payment column, enter your 16-digit payment code
4. Confirm that the Virtual Account code, account holder name, products, and payment amount are correct
5. Enter your password and mToken
6. Save the transfer receipt for your records
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID155_mobile_bank:
1. Log in to your BCA mobile banking account and enter your m-BCA access code
2. Select "m-Transfer" > "BCA Virtual Account"
3. Select "Daftar Transfer" or enter your 16-digit payment code
4. Enter your m-BCA PIN to initiate the payment
5. Take a screenshot of the confirmation screen or save the payment notification for your records.
pipo_payin_paymentcode_ID888_atm_content:
This payment method applies when you use a Mandiri virtual account to make a payment through another bank's ATM.
Note: A standard transaction fee may apply on ATM transfers.
1. Select "Transfer Online" or "Transfer to other bank"
2. Enter Mandiri bank code (008)
3. Enter your Virtual Account Number in the destination number section
4. Enter the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. Confirm that all the information is correct on the next screen and continue to initiate the payment
6. Confirm that the payment confirmation screen is displayed
7. When the transaction is completed, print out a receipt and keep it for your records
pipo_payin_paymentcode_Indomaret_CVS_con:
1. Select Indomaret payment option and write down your 16-digit payment code
2. Go to Alfamart, Alfamidi, or  Lawson store to make a payment
3. Inform the cashier that you wish to make a convenience store payment to TikTok via Doku, and provide your payment code
4. Wait for the cashier to confirm the merchant name, customer name, and the payment amount
5. Make the payment
6. When the transaction is completed, make sure to receive the receipt with a stamp and the cashier's signature
pipo_payin_paymentcode_Indomaret_ikios_c:
1. Open i.saku app
2. Select "Look All " and "Online Shopping" 
3. Select "TikTok"
4. Enter your 16-digit payment code and the transaction amount exactly as it appears on your order
5. Select "Pay" to initiate the payment
pipo_payin_paymentcode_instrcution_hint: Please follow the instruction strictly, otherwise the transaction may fail.
pipo_payin_paymentcode_remind: Take a screenshot of this page or take a note of your payment code for your records. You can find this page any time on the TikTok app by going to Me options menu, then selecting Settings and privacy > Orders > Unpaid > View code.
pipo_payin_paymentcode_subtitle_expired: If you still wish to purchase the items, you will need to repeat the order process
pipo_payin_paymentcode_subtitle_failed: Payment has been failed, please contact the customer service
pipo_payin_paymentcode_subtitle_success: The payment has been processed. Please check your order
pipo_payin_paymentcode_subtitle_waitingf: Pay within {countdown} before the payment code expires
pipo_payin_paymentcode_waitingforpayment: The payment code is no longer valid
pipo_payin_security_note: Your details are secured by PCI DSS. This complies with the strongest identity authentication standard available today.
pipo_payin_sgpimanage_primarypopup_body: 1. You can only set one card as the primary payment method.
pipo_payin_sgpimanage_primarypopup_body1: 2. The current primary payment method will no longer be set as primary.
pipo_payin_sgpimanage_primarypopup_body_: 1. You can only set one card as the primary payment method.
pipo_payin_sgpimanage_primarypopup_title: Set this method as the primary payment method?
pipo_payin_sgpimanage_unbindpopup_body: If you want to remove this payment method from the list of payment options, tap "Remove".
pipo_payment_error_expire_date_early: Expiration date must not be earlier than current month.
pipo_payment_error_incorrect_digits: Card number digits is not correct.
pipo_payment_error_pay001: Generic payment error​. Please contact customer service.
pipo_payment_error_unaccept_card_org: Card organization is not accepted currently.
pipo_paypal_hyperwallet_notice: The payment may be processed by Hyperwallet, a PayPal service, or by PayPal directly. Hyperwallet {Privacy_Policy} and {Terms_of_Service}
pipo_security_error_sec003_1: Detected possible fraud​. Please contact customer service.
pipo_security_error_sec003_2: Detected possible chargeback​. Please contact customer service.
tp_error_tp0007: Insufficient funds in your bank account or your payment service account.
tp_error_tp0008: Transaction couldn't be processed. Please try again later or contact customer support for details.
tp_error_tp0009: Too many PIN entry attempts. Try again in 24 hours.
pipo_payin_dropin_cashier_bindcard_cardn: Allow camera access to start taking pictures.
Align the edges of your bank card to this frame
